#### Outputs
- Meta-regression model results and plots for selected vaccine


#Janssen

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(metafor)
library(dmetar)
library(forestplot)
library(patchwork)
library("scales")

VEmetareg <- read_csv("Data/Processed/COVID19VE_ineq_merged_filtered_eligible_selected_metareg_var.csv") %>% 
  filter(include=="yes")

# summarise study counts
VEmetareg %>% group_by(variant_clean, clean_vaccine, q_GNI_per_c_WB) %>%
  summarise(n = sum(!is.na(`study ID`)))
# 1 for mRNA-1273 omicron 2/3 and mRNA-1273 delta 1

# Recode levels
VEmetareg$clean_vaccine[VEmetareg$clean_vaccine=="Janssen Ad26.COV2.S"] = "Ad26.COV2.S"
VEmetareg$clean_vaccine[VEmetareg$clean_vaccine=="BioNTech/Pfizer BNT162b2"] = "BNT162b2"
VEmetareg$clean_vaccine[VEmetareg$clean_vaccine=="Oxford/AstraZeneca ChAdOx1-S"] = "ChAdOx1-S"
VEmetareg$clean_vaccine[VEmetareg$clean_vaccine=="Moderna mRNA-1273"] = "mRNA-1273"
VEmetareg$clean_vaccine = factor(VEmetareg$clean_vaccine, levels = c("BNT162b2", "ChAdOx1-S", "mRNA-1273", "Ad26.COV2.S"))

metareg_collated <- rbind(
  read_csv("Data/Processed/meta_summary_Ad26.COV2.S.csv"),
  read_csv("Data/Processed/meta_summary_BNT162b2.csv"),
  read_csv("Data/Processed/meta_summary_ChAdOx1-S.csv"),
  read_csv("Data/Processed/meta_summary_mRNA-1273.csv")
) 
metareg_collated$clean_vaccine = factor(metareg_collated$clean_vaccine, levels = c("BNT162b2", "ChAdOx1-S", "mRNA-1273", "Ad26.COV2.S"))

metareg_collated$`N studies` = ">1"
metareg_collated$`N studies`[metareg_collated$VoI == "omicron" & 
                          metareg_collated$clean_vaccine == "mRNA-1273" & 
                          metareg_collated$GNI %in% c(2,3)] = "1"
metareg_collated$`N studies`[metareg_collated$VoI == "delta" & 
                          metareg_collated$clean_vaccine == "mRNA-1273" & 
                          metareg_collated$GNI %in% c(2)] = "1"

## set variant levels
metareg_collated$VoI = factor(metareg_collated$VoI, levels=c("omicron", "delta"))
VEmetareg$variant_clean = factor(VEmetareg$variant_clean, levels=c("omicron", "delta"))

## reverse log10 transformation
reverselog_trans <- function(base = exp(1)) {
    trans <- function(x) -log(x, base)
    inv <- function(x) base^(-x)
    trans_new(paste0("reverselog-", format(base)), trans, inv, 
              log_breaks(base = base), 
              domain = c(1e-100, Inf))
}

ggplot() +
  geom_point(data = metareg_collated, aes(x = VoI, y = pred, color = as.factor(GNI), shape = `N studies`),
    position = position_dodge(width = 0.8), size=2.5) +
  geom_errorbar(
    data = metareg_collated,
    aes(x = VoI, y = pred, color = as.factor(GNI), ymin = ci.lb, ymax = ci.ub),
    width = 0, position = position_dodge(width = 0.8)) +
  geom_point(data = VEmetareg,
    aes(x = variant_clean,y = RR, size = 1 / SE.ln.RR ^ 2, color = as.factor(q_GNI_per_c_WB)),
    alpha = 0.3, position = position_jitterdodge(jitter.width=0.3)) +
  labs(x = "", y = "Vaccine effectiveness") +
  scale_shape_manual(values=c(15, 0)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "right") +
  scale_color_manual(
    name = "GNI quartile", 
     values = c("#44BB99","#AAAA00","#EE8866"),
    labels =  c("2 (lower\nincome)" ,"3","4 (higher\nincome)")
  ) +
  guides(size = "none", colour = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE), shape = guide_legend(reverse = TRUE), ) + 
  geom_hline(yintercept = 1, linetype = "dashed", color = "black") +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_grid(.~clean_vaccine) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1), labels = c(99,90,50,0), trans = reverselog_trans(10)) +
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1), 
        axis.text.y = element_text(size=10),
        strip.text = element_text(size=10))
```
